content:
**Adjusting authentication scopes**

The user encountered a 403 error, which suggests insufficient authentication scopes. Our current scope, "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform," might not be sufficient. I'll check the documentation on required scopes for Gemini Pro API. It looks like the error relates to an incorrect access token scope for the "google.ai.generativelanguage.v1beta.GenerativeService.GenerateContent" method. We might need to use "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/generative.language" instead. I'll update the SCOPES variable to reflect the correct scope for the generative language API.
